attributes.action: Exert pressure on the Icelandic government to stop the Hvakur hf whaling company
attributes.background: Icelandic government have granted Hvakur hf a licence to allow them to kill 238 endangered fin whales.   They have just accidently killed a young blue whale which are highly endangered and protected by law. Tourism revenue is better for Iceland than killing these beautiful creatures.  @sea_legacy.
